#BlackMagicCraft #Episode191 #OverEasy

This was a REALLY fun project where I take some left over packaging trash and turn it into neat scatter terrain for tabletop gaming. 

Some specific items used in this build

Sculptamold
(USA) https://amzn.to/37h1Kvm
(Canada) https://amzn.to/39uMRXJ
(UK) https://amzn.to/3bwVaUK
(Germany) https://amzn.to/2Sisurm

(Canada) https://amzn.to/2OKB67M
(UK) https://amzn.to/2SFGudo
(Germany) https://amzn.to/2UHx4Rn

UV Flashlight
(USA) https://amzn.to/3bvSBmb
(Canada) https://amzn.to/2HaYyXJ
